definition: to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown

sentences.english: After sterilization let teether cool down before use.
sentences.chinese: 滅菌後，讓咬牙冷卻後再使用。

sentences.english: Heating in low temperature could prolong the shelf-life of the spiced beef in a certain extent.
sentences.chinese: 低溫加熱滅菌可在一定程度上延長滷牛肉的貨架期。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To analyze the cause of failure of bacteria-killing by autoclave.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析高壓蒸汽滅菌失敗原因。

sentences.english: All instruments and materials used in the surgical procedure must be handled aseptically.
sentences.chinese: 手術過程中所有用到的器械及材料均應滅菌。

sentences.english: Miejunxing hardly have no effects on pathogen.
sentences.chinese: 滅菌星對病原菌幾乎沒有抑制作用。

sentences.english: Manage CAPA related to sterilization activities.
Lately , a new type of sterilizer has appeared on the market.
sentences.chinese: 最近，一種新型的滅菌器問世了。

sentences.english: Cisplatin Injection is a sterile solution of Cisplatin.
sentences.chinese: 順鉑注射液是順鉑的滅菌水溶液。

sentences.english: Shell powder coating has biological sterilizing characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 貝殼粉塗料具有生物滅菌的特性。
醫生對其所用器械進行輻射滅菌。

sentences.english: Dosimeter absorbances should be read within a short period after exposure to radiation.
sentences.chinese: 輻射滅菌，應儘快劑指劑讀數據。

sentences.english: Conelusions This kind of sterilization equipment can reach the goal to completely sterilize the dental handpieces in chamber…
sentences.chinese: 結論該系統通過規範化操作可以做到手機腔管內滅菌。

sentences.english: Last, we used Staphylococcus aureus and Escherichia coli for the experiment of biological activities.
sentences.chinese: 並且利用金黃色葡萄球菌與大腸菌來做滅菌率的測試。

sentences.english: Some compound neutralizers may change in property after autoclaving.
sentences.chinese: 有的複方中和劑在壓力蒸汽滅菌後性能可發生變化。

sentences.english: Control (non-LPS) rats received sterilized saline only.
sentences.chinese: 對照組系投與滅菌生理食鹽水。

sentences.english: Another method of sterilization that has been practiced is the use of gaseous ethylene oxide.
sentences.chinese: 另一種滅菌方法是使用環氧乙烷。

pinyin: you1 men2 luo2 xuan2 gan3 jun1

definition: to eliminate dust (i.e. filter out suspended particles)
